snippet.title: ODDRooM Early Access Release   Trailer
snippet.description:
TEAM ODD has released the Early Access version of its dark comic action FPS “ODDRooM” on Steam on March 17th. TEAM ODD is a small team of veterans.


Retro sensibilities, unrealistic movement, and three-dimensional action combine in a modern system.
ODDRooM offers an unrealistic and ODD combat experience in the surreal world of lucid dreaming. 
The gameplay combines a retro sensibility with modern systems, with unrealistic movement and three-dimensional action, including the ability to see and dodge incoming bullets, fast and fluid movement, and a sense of speed that makes you feel like you're flying around.  

When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
ODDROM doesn't simply convey a desperate struggle to escape a nightmare. 
The optimistic nature of the protagonist's mindset keeps the overall tone of the game lighthearted, even in the midst of intense combat.
 
Make the dream your own.
Players can experience the process of gradually expanding their abilities, building their own strategies, and becoming stronger as they control their dreams.
 
Monsters in your dreams will pressure you in different ways, and you'll have to respond creatively by utilizing a dynamic action system.

TEAM ODD is celebrating the release of ODDROOM with a 25% discount starting March 17th. 
For more information on ODDROOM, visit the Steam Store page.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2795230/ODDRooM/
